meanings.definition: A code that is part of a larger code.
meanings.sent1: The subcode helped me understand the main code better.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to include the subcode when decoding the message.
meanings.sent3: The subcode was like a secret key to unlock the hidden message.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the subcode to her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The subcode acted as a puzzle piece, fitting perfectly into the larger picture.

meanings.definition: To assign a subcode to a larger code.
meanings.sent1: I need to subcode each section for easier reference.
meanings.sent2: Remember to subcode the different parts for organization.
meanings.sent3: She decided to subcode the chapters by color-coding them.
meanings.sent4: His actions seemed to subcode his true intentions.
meanings.sent5: Subcoding the files made it simpler to find specific information quickly.
